correlation-index.description: An arbitrary numeric value used to identify the correlation ID used in request and response messages; null matches singular absent header property.

topic.description: The MQTT topic to which the message is published.

payload.description: The UTF8 string encapsulated in the response payload, or null if no payload.

metadata.description: Keys and values of header fields in the message; a null value indicates field should not be present.

command-status.description: HTTP status code in the message, or null if no status code present.

is-application-error.description: In an error response, whether the error is in the application rather than in the platform.
